SELECT user_idx , user_id , user_email , user_name , user_phone_number , user_gender , user_reg_date , user_status FROM USER WHERE user_type = 1 AND user_status != 3
AND user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
ORDER BY
user_reg_date DESC
user_reg_date ASC
user_idx DESC
LIMIT #{startRow} , #{listLimit}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER WHERE user_type = 1 AND user_status != 3
AND user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')

SELECT user_idx , user_name , user_rep_name , user_id , user_birth , user_phone_number , user_phone_number_sub , user_email , user_gender , user_postcode , user_address1 , user_address2 FROM USER WHERE user_idx = #{idx}

SELECT user_idx , user_name , user_id , user_email , user_phone_number , user_reg_date , user_status FROM USER WHERE user_type = 2 AND user_status != 3
AND user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND user_status = 5
AND user_status = 1
ORDER BY
user_reg_date DESC
user_reg_date ASC
user_status DESC
user_reg_date
LIMIT #{startRow} , #{listLimit}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER WHERE user_type = 2
AND user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')

SELECT user_idx , user_name , user_rep_name , user_birth , user_id , user_email , user_phone_number , user_phone_number_sub , user_postcode , user_address1 , user_address2 , user_status FROM USER WHERE user_idx = #{idx}

SELECT c.user_idx , c.biz_reg_no , c.biz_file_name , c.biz_file_path , f.file_id , f.original_file_name , f.real_file_name , f.sub_dir , f.file_size , f.content_type FROM COMPANY c LEFT JOIN FILE f ON c.user_idx = f.idx WHERE c.user_idx = #{idx}
